name: Summer Splash Party! Hakui Koyori
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《hololive》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《hololive》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Summer Splash Party! Amane Kanata
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and move it to another open position of their center stage.

name: Summer Splash Party! La+ Darknesss
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《hololive》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "A Step Towards the Future, La+ Darknesss", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《hololive》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Summer Splash Party! Mori Calliope
text: 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《hololive》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《hololive》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and shuffle your deck.

name: Summer Splash Party! Shiranui Flare
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play events or "Backup" from your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

name: Summer Splash Party! Takanashi Kiara
text: 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《hololive》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《hololive》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)

name: Summer Splash Party! Natsuiro Matsuri
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《hololive》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《hololive》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Natsuiro Matsuri", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your "Natsuiro Matsuri", and that character gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Summer Splash Party! Inugami Korone
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may choose 1 "A Step Towards the Future, Inugami Korone" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, your opponent chooses 1 character or event from among them, you put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Summer Splash Party! Tsunomaki Watame
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《hololive》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Towards the Future Together, Tsunomaki Watame" in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.

name: Summer Splash Party! Oozora Subaru
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When your climax with [[choice.gif]] in its trigger icon triggers, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [Put 1 "Summer Memories, Oozora Subaru" from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Summer Splash Party! Kazama Iroha
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《hololive》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《hololive》 character, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."

name: Summer Splash Party! Watson Amelia
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《hololive》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.

name: Summer Splash Party! Ookami Mio
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level X or lower 《hololive》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of "Summer Festival and Candy Apple, Ookami Mio" in your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.

name: Summer Splash Party! Aki Rosenthal
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 3 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 "What Should I Choose? AkiRose" in your hand, and put it in the stage position that this card was in." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《hololive》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Summer Splash Party! Himemori Luna

If you do, choose 1 "Enthusiastically Dressed, Himemori Luna" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage as 【REST】.

name: Summer Splash Party! Kobo Kanaeru

If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《hololive》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Moments of Relaxation, IRyS" in your back stage, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《hololive》 characters, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Summer Splash Party! Tokino Sora
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Summer Splash Party! Sakamata Chloe

If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《hololive》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.

name: Summer Splash Party! Robocosan
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the stage, this card's card name will also be regarded as "Proud, Robocosan". 【CONT】 All of your other "Leave It to Me! Robocosan" get +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《hololive》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《hololive》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

X is equal to the number of 《hololive》 characters you have ×1000.

(Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Summer Splash Party! Airani Iofifteen
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent has a level 3 or higher character, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each other 《hololive》 character in your center stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 《hololive》 character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and at the beginning of the encore step, your opponent puts that character from their memory in any position of their stage.

name: Summer Splash Party! Nanashi Mumei
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《hololive》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 "On a Twilight Hill" from your climax area into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's waiting room, put them on top of your opponent's deck in any order, and deal 5 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Summer Splash Party! Yukihana Lamy
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《hololive》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 2 or more cards with different card names, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《hololive》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Summer Splash Party! Shirogane Noel
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《hololive》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, if "Together With Danchou" is in your climax area, and you have another 《hololive》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent puts the top 20 cards of their deck into their waiting room, you look at up to 2 cards from the top of their deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it at the bottom of their deck, and put the remaining cards on the top of their deck in any order.
